%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW employeegroup_grouped
    AS

SELECT 
    EEGrp,
    First(Employee_Group) AS EmployeeGroup,
    last(expected_from) AS expected_from  
    
FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr
WHERE EEGrp IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY EEGrp;

# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (sap hr) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.payband_dim)
- **New Data:** where a PA in the source does not exist as an PSGroupCode in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on PA in source and PSGroupCode in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an PSGroupCode in the target exists but the same PA doesn't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View employeegroup_dim_new is created

%%sql
-- Build payband_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW employeegroup_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.EEGrp IS NULL
        THEN T7.EmployeeGroupID
        ELSE NULL
    END as EmployeeGroupID, -- surrogate key
    T1.EEGrp, -- source system id
    T1.EmployeeGroup, 
    T2.SourceSystemID as SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from) AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.EEGrp,'.'), IFNULL(T1.EmployeeGroup,'.'))) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive,
    T7.IsActive as HistoricIsActive

FROM employeegroup_grouped T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description and T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employeegroup_dim T7 ON T1.EEGrp = T7.EEGrp AND T7.IsActive = 'Y' 
WHERE
        -- flags new data        
    (   CASE
            WHEN T1.EEGrp = T7.EEGrp AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.EEGrp,'.'), IFNULL(T1.EmployeeGroup,'.')))  <> T7.RowID   -- same employee, changed data
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T7.EEGrp IS NULL -- new employee
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' )

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **employeegroup_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View employeegroup_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Creating new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW employeegroup_dim_changed_rows

    AS

SELECT 
    EmployeeGroupID,
    EEGrp,
    EmployeeGroup,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM employeegroup_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

SELECT
    EmployeeGroupID,
    EEGrp,
    EmployeeGroup,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_employeegroup_dim
WHERE EEGrp IN (SELECT EEGrp FROM employeegroup_dim_new WHERE EmployeeGroupID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM employeegroup_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW employeegroup_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    EmployeeGroupID,
    EEGrp,
    EmployeeGroup,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM employeegroup_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View employeegroup_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. PA from SAPHR), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.employeegroup_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.hr_employeegroup_dim AS Target
USING employeegroup_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.EmployeeGroupID = Target.EmployeeGroupID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

 -- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (EmployeeGroupID,
        EEGrp,
        EmployeeGroup,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)  
        VALUES (Source.EmployeeGroupID,
        Source.EEGrp,
        Source.EmployeeGroup,
        Source.SourceSystemID, 
        Source.IngestionDate, 
        Source.ValidTo, 
        Source.RowID, 
        Source.IsActive) ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.employeegroup_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new employeegroup

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.hr_employeegroup_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY EmployeeGroupID NULLS LAST) AS EmployeeGroupID,
    EEGrp,
    EmployeeGroup,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_employeegroup_dim;
